text: what's up outliers quick market update it's been a minute since I took a look at gme so that's the goal for today but as you could tell we have a little guest appearance which is my spine today I had the pleasure of getting an epidural injection you can see there's actually two of them here and it's for all the dis stuff that I'm trying to resolve right now this is supposed to help reduce inflammation but I've never seen anything like this before so I thought I would share it with you because as I mention all the time the goal of what I do is to share knowledge some of it trading related most of it that's where most of my knowledge is but some of it is in learning stuff about this which is actually kind of cool these are like super big needles I think they said they were like 3 and 1 12 in and they go into the epidural space they put in a contrast that's what makes the nerves here you can actually see the nerves it's what makes the nerves this darker color so that they can see them and then yeah interesting I thought overall and the other fun fact is these little bends the doctor actually puts the bends in them herself and it's so that she can drive the needle better meaning you know position it to where she wants so fun stuff all around all right
